title: Ep 236 | Phil Performs a Wedding, Visiting Spiritual Graveyards & Sharing Jesus in Locked-Down Areas
description:
Phil performs a last-minute wedding ceremony for a recently baptized believer and his bride. Al refuses to let the Michigan lockdown interfere with sharing Jesus. The guys talk about common sense and what to do when the wrong people are in charge. Jase believes there's a much better question about baptism than "Do I have to?" He also encourages Christians to visit their spiritual graveyards and marvels at the wealth of obscure knowledge bouncing around in Phil's head.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
